messages.poi.stones.examine:
THERE IS NOTHING
UNDER THESE STONES
messages.poi.echocorpse.success:
HE WAS ONE OF OUR
BEST WARRIORS
messages.splash.holy.1:
I FOUND A PIECE OF
A STRANGE LANCE
messages.splash.holy.2:
I NOW POSSES THE
MIGHTY HOLY LANCE
messages.intro.text.1:
WE WERE SENT BY THE
POPE INTO THE LANDS
OF LANGOBARDIA 
HORRIBILIS. OUR
MISSION WAS TO
FIND THE HOLY
LANCE...
messages.intro.text.2:
WE FINALLY ARRIVED
IN THE WATERS
OF TREBIA RIVER,
CLOSE TO SANCTI
COLUMBANI CHURCH...
messages.intro.text.3:
HOWEVER, THE RIVER
FLOODED THE LANDS,
AND OUR GROUP WAS
CAUGHT BY THE FORCES
OF DARKNESS...
messages.intro.text.4:
I AM ALONE,BUT I
WILL FIND THE
WAY TO THE CHURCH.
GOD, LOOK UPON ME.
